abstract: A NASA scientist is lauded for communicating about climate.
snippet: A NASA scientist is lauded for communicating about climate.
lead_paragraph: 5:23 p.m. | Updated Gavin Schmidt, the climate modeler at NASA and Columbia University who has long endured the slings and arrows that come with blogging on climate, has now gained a laurel for his efforts -- the inaugural $25,000 Climate Communications Prize of the American Geophysical Union. [The geophysical union release is now posted.]

headline.main: A Deserved Award for Gavin Schmidt of Real Climate and NASA
